body:
Function stream_context_get_options() can be used to fetch the options array from a given context.

    $expectedStreamContextOptions = array(
        'ssl' => array(
            'verify_peer' => false,
            'verify_peer_name' => false,
            'allow_self_signed' => true,
        )
    );

    $defaultStreamContext = stream_context_get_default();
    $defaultStreamContextOptions = stream_context_get_options($defaultStreamContext);

Thanks to Paul Crovella for his comment.
title: Get stream context defaults in a human-readable format
